comments_since_last_sample.body:
Follow me on Twitch If you want to catch some classic Skyblock Modpack streams!
https://www.twitch.tv/xisuma

Hermits: (Build giant, well-engineered and super efficient farms)
Also Hermits: (Only give three double chests of storage)
Why didn't you use waterlogged trapdoors? Much cheaper in the iron and redstone side, and a bit less complicated.
U can use waterlogged trapdoors instead of pistons for the string farm and also if u push the waterlogged stairs with a 1 tick pulse from a sticky piston the water won't go away
The title was the king of string but now it's changed lol
I still have no idea how any of the exploits Doc uses work. They all seem too good to be true for survival Minecraft.
So glad you're feeling a bit better now! ❤

Your pronouncing acacia as a•cha•cha and I don’t know if this is like an inside joke, you trying to piss off the audience, or just not knowing how to pronounce it but I looked it up and it’s uh•kay•shuh.

"I just said 'founded'. That is not a proper word!"
Yes it is.
Docm is going insane this season he is really becoming goat father of the server

Me: I wanna build this farm. 
Also me after realising I have a spawner near my base : Am I an idiot sandwich.

Can someone explain how docs inventory system works, it does not seem possible without commands or mods it’s at 19:00 at first I thought he was just picking up sponges but when the wet ones left that really confused me

Hi xisuma :) You forgot your Beacon in the Nether. :) 

In your last live stream, you talked about music, and especially a group that caught my interest ..... it was Limp Bizkit ..... and the only song I can remember hearing was their "Behind blue eyes ". At the time it came out, I had an inner anger towards the world, but especially the treatment I had received from my caseworker in the municipality. I had lost both my parents a few days apart a few years before and I didn't have had my grief treated. My whole world collapsed .... how would my future be .... I have never reacted violently because I was "so good" at hiding my anger from the outside ..... but deep down, I had a strong feeling of doing something drastic ...... but my sense of reason had taken over ..... so my anger was locked inside me ..... which I am sure was the reason I went down with depression. Therefore, this song was the reason I could find energy to keep the deepest depression away for periods. :)

I dunno Are ur moons and suns different From vanilla
Also don’t Judge my typing cause i got some wierd autocorrect

I think that it would be neat to see the hermits all working together on farms. Maybe next season all the farms could be community farms. Since less farms should cut down on lag. It'd just be interesting to see how they would do it.
I don't understand why people harvest desserts for sand to make glass. When you can trade glass with villagers and it's twice as fast
